instructions.content: Ensure comprehensive alignment with privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA) and industry standards (SOC 2, ISO 27001, PCI DSS). Implement role-based access control (RBAC) with principle of least privilege, integrated with identity providers. Include regular access reviews, automated provisioning/deprovisioning, and segregation of duties for sensitive operations. Automatically redact PII from data processing, maintain detailed audit trails for compliance reporting. Implement comprehensive audit logging for all sensitive operations including user actions, data access, configuration changes, and security events. Ensure logs are tamper-proof and retained per compliance requirements. Implement data privacy by design with minimal data collection, clear privacy notices, user consent management, and support for data subject rights (access, rectification, deletion, portability). Maintain documentation required for regulatory compliance including security controls, data flows, and risk assessments.
